# 3speak Video Player Project - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
HTML5 video player for 3speak using Video.js, supporting both legacy and new video systems.

## Setup Progress

- [x] Create project structure
- [x] Initialize npm project
- [x] Install Video.js and dependencies
- [x] Create source files
- [x] Build and test locally
- [ ] Prepare for VPS deployment

## Tech Stack
- Video.js (compiled from source)
- HTML5, CSS, JavaScript
- npm for dependency management
